data.name: Accept_Responsibility_For_All_Activities_Text
data.value: accept responsibility for all activities associated with your email and password, and your account

data.name: Agree_To_Comply_Text
data.value: agree to comply with any amendments to these Terms and Conditions

data.name: Agree_To_Indemnify_Text
data.value: agree to indemnify the DfE against any losses, expenses, damages or claims we may incur as a result of any failure by you to comply with the obligations set out in these terms

data.name: As_Training_Provider_Text
data.value: As a training provider or awarding organisation you must:

data.name: A_Users_Rights_To_User_This_Service_Text
data.value: A user’s rights to use this service may be removed or amended if you are found to be in breach of these terms and conditions. Our decision in the event of a breach shall be final.

data.name: By_Using_The_Mange_TLevels_Text
data.value: By using the Manage T Level results service you agree to these terms and conditions.

data.name: Comply_With_The_Uk_Computer_Text
data.value: comply with the UK Computer Misuse Act 1990

data.name: Contact_Us_If_You_Are_Aware_Text
data.value: contact us if you're aware of any security breach

data.name: Delay_Or_Failure_In_Receiving_Data_Text
data.value: delay or failure in receiving data

data.name: Endeavour_To_Ensure_Text
data.value: and endeavour to ensure that the service is continuously available, virus free and that the information we provide is accurate and complete.

data.name: Ensure_That_Any_Personal_Data_Text
data.value: ensure that any personal data (as defined under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Data Protection Act 2018) is protected, used only for the purposes for which it was obtained and disposed of appropriately

data.name: Ensure_Users_Given_Editor_Roles_Text
data.value: ensure users given editor roles have delegated authority on behalf of the organisation to enter and remove providers offering T Levels, register students, enter student results and request certificates

data.name: Ensure_Users_Given_Site_Administrator_Text
data.value: ensure users given site administrator roles have delegated authority on behalf of the organisation to confirm T Level details, enter providers offering T Levels, register students, enter student results and request certificates

data.name: Enuser_Users_Given_Reviewer_Roles_Text
data.value: ensure users given reviewer roles have delegated authority on behalf of the organisation to confirm T Level details

data.name: However_Esfa_Accept_No_Liability_For_Text
data.value: However, the ESFA accepts no liability for:

data.name: Keep_Your_Dfe_Signin_Account_Details_Text
data.value: keep your DfE Sign-in account details confidential and secure

data.name: Loss_Of_Any_Data_Text
data.value: loss of any data

data.name: Loss_Or_Damage_Araising_Text
data.value: loss or damage arising from the use of the service or reliance on its content

data.name: Not_Use_Manage_TLevel_Results_Text
data.value: not use Manage T Level results for any unlawful purpose

data.name: Opens_In_New_Window_Or_Tab_Text
data.value: (opens in a new window or tab)

data.name: Our_Responsibilities_Text
data.value: Our responsibilities

data.name: Page_Title
data.value: Terms and conditions

data.name: Section_Heading
data.value: Terms and conditions

data.name: Sign_In_From_Only_One_PC_Text
data.value: sign in from only one PC at a time

data.name: Singout_Of_Manage_TLevels_Results_Text
data.value: sign out of Manage T Levels results using the sign-out function when you have finished your session

data.name: The_Content_And_Availability_Text
data.value: the content and availability of external websites that link to the service or which are linked from it

data.name: This_Service_Is_Run_By_Text
data.value: This service is run by the Education and Skills Funding Agency (ESFA), an executive agency of the Department for Education (DfE). We comply with the

data.name: Uk_Data_Protection_Act_2018_Text
data.value: UK Data Protection Act 2018

data.name: Your_Information_Will_Be_Used_Text
data.value: Your information will be used to establish your identity and permissions when using a DfE service.

data.name: Your_Responsibilities_Text
data.value: Your responsibilities

data.name: You_Being_Unable_To_Access_The_Service_Text
data.value: you being unable to access the service (for example owing to excessive demand or because we've taken the service down for maintenance)
